# NSMetadataQueryGatheringProgress

**Type Property**

Posted as the receiver is collecting results during the initial result-gathering phase of the query.

## Declaration

```swift
static let NSMetadataQueryGatheringProgress: NSNotification.Name
```

## Notifications

- **NSMetadataQueryDidFinishGathering**: Posted when the receiver has finished with the initial result-gathering phase of the query.
- **NSMetadataQueryDidStartGathering**: Posted when the receiver begins with the initial result-gathering phase of the query.
- **NSMetadataQueryDidUpdate**: Posted when the receiver’s results have changed during the live-update phase of the query.
